subject: order #SSN1765
description_text:
Hi !!! I am wondering where my order is. I have paid extra money for fast
shipping ,5-15 day if I remember correctly and for what I see with my
tracking number the package hasn't been picked up yet.

Can I have clarification on that please?
 Thank

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin Guinard,  Sorry, the first batch of VAM Pro stock was consumed, the second batch will be delivered tomorrow, we will ship it to you as soon as possible and refund you the extra shipping cost as compensation, we apologize for the delay!

Hi!! i just receive my order. Thank you for that but unfortunately i can
make them work in iracing. i can feel the vibration true simpson manager
when i click on test but that it. In game nothing. I have the option
vibrate pedals and wheel in game too. Can you help me ?

Thank

Le lun. 30 juin 2025, à 06 h 55, service@simsonn.com

Hi Martin Guinard,     Which game are you using?     We’re about to release SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.9, which will include native support for the following games.  In addition, the official SimHub 9.9.3 version has been released and now offers full support for SIMSONN ProX, ProX Ultra, and PlusX pedals.
